pageTitle: Farray's International Dance Center | Dance School in Barcelona
metaDescription: Dance school in Barcelona with 25+ styles: salsa, bachata, hip hop, ballet and more. Exclusive Farray Method®. CID-UNESCO center. Book your welcome class.

teachersSubtitle: Professionals trained at the world's best schools
teacher.yunaisyFarray.specialty: Director & Founder - Specialist in Afro Jazz and Cuban Salsa
teacher.yunaisyFarray.bio: Hollywood dancer, this Cuban professional trained at the National School of Arts of Cuba (ENA), is our founder and director. With over two decades of international experience, Yunaisy has participated in the movie 'Street Dance 2', 'Got Talent' finals and programs like 'The Dancer'. Considered one of the most complete dancers in the world, she participates in the most important dance festivals globally. Creator of the Farray Method®.
teacher.danielSene.specialty: Specialist in Classical Ballet, Contemporary and Yoga
teacher.danielSene.bio: Daniel Sené is a professional dancer trained at the prestigious National Ballet School of Cuba. Specialist in Cuban classical technique and contemporary dance, he brings the academic rigor and elegance typical of the Cuban tradition. A deep connoisseur of the human body, he also stands out for his mastery in Yoga, Tai-Chi and Stretching.
teacher.alejandroMinoso.specialty: Specialist in Ballet, Modern Jazz and Afro Jazz
teacher.alejandroMinoso.bio: Alejandro Miñoso is a Cuban professional dancer trained at ENA and former soloist of the prestigious Carlos Acosta company, one of the best dancers in history. His expertise in the fusion of classical and afro styles makes him a versatile teacher, capable of transitioning between ballet, modern jazz, afro jazz, contemporary and afro contemporary with equal mastery.
teacher.iroelBastarreche.specialty: Specialist in Cuban Salsa and Afro-Caribbean Folklore
teacher.iroelBastarreche.bio: Iroel Bastarreche, known as Iro, was born in Camagüey (Cuba) and trained at the Vocational School of Arts of Cuba. He was part of the prestigious Maraguán Artistic Ensemble and the Folkloric Ballet of Camagüey. Since 2014 in Barcelona, he has trained in the Farray Method® with Yunaisy Farray and is currently considered by many as one of the references in teaching Cuban styles throughout Barcelona.
